summary: An underworld drama set in the early 1980s, about a lonely factory worker whose life is transformed when he becomes a nightclub doorman.
cast: Mel Raido|Colin Salmon|Shaun Parkes|Scot Williams|Ellen Thomas|Aicha McKenzie|Ronnie Fox|Simon Paul Sutton|Charlie May-Clark|Katherine McGolpin|Maxine Peake|Ian Ralph|Dominic Coleman|Danny Green|Nick Holder|Neil Morrissey|Nikki Sanderson|James J. McLaren|Jack Pierce|Barrett Robertson|Margaret Henshaw|Natalie Gumede|Jamie Kenna|Ian Virgo|Orson Nava|Michelle Marsh|Ciaran Griffiths|Hayley Evetts|Tom McKay|Adrian Sharp|Bronson Webb|Lucy Lowe|Naomi Millbank-Smith|David Schaal|Jonathan Willis|Daniel Ife|Emily Jardine|Jayson Keeler|Catherine Laine|Renee Lee Rose|Vincent Woods|Nick Turner
title: Clubbed
